page.label: This extension applies colors from a color file to the objects in this document.
COL, INF, EDR
Select the file and apply. The chosen method is not important for these file types.
TXT
Import an Ink/Stitch threadlist file (created through the zip export option).

Import any other Threadlist file in txt format. Ink/Stitch will try to match the colors to the selected thread palette. The objects in this document will be colored accordingly if color matching has been successful.
Get more information on our website
https://inkstitch.org/docs/thread-color/#apply-threadlist
